parameters.name: reps
parameters.description: How many repetitions of the stimuli

parameters.name: soa
parameters.description: Stimulus onset asynchrony - how long between stimuli (ms)

parameters.name: numstim
parameters.description: Max number of different stimuli to use, sampled at the beginning of the test. Each rep will use a complete crossing of pairs

parameters.name: maxtrials
parameters.description: If the design is longer than this, it will shorten the study to this many trials.

parameters.name: breaks
parameters.description: give break after ever breaks trials. 0 for no breaks.
